idea-plugin.name: N1QL Query Generator
idea-plugin.description:
N1QL Query Generator for Couchbase

A visual, form-based query builder that helps developers generate Couchbase N1QL queries without needing to memorize syntax.

Features:

  • Visual query builder with guided UI
  • Support for SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, UPSERT operations
  • Dynamic WHERE clause builder with multiple conditions
  • Aggregation builder (GROUP BY, COUNT, SUM, AVG, etc.)
  • Subquery support for complex queries
  • Syntax highlighting in query preview
  • Query history with favorites
  • Built-in and custom query templates
  • JSON schema import for field suggestions
  • One-click copy to clipboard or insert at cursor
  • No database connection required - pure offline query generation

Perfect for developers new to Couchbase or those who want to quickly generate correct N1QL syntax.
